name: Melodie
description: When it comes to Karaoke, Melodie shows no mercy. Armed with her kawaii looks and devilish set of pipes, she never fails to steal the limelight.

stats.movementspeed: 720 (Normal), 778 (with Fast Beats and one music note), 835 (with Fast Beats and two music notes), 893 (with Fast Beats and three music notes), 3000 (with Super)

gadgets.name: Perfect Pitch
gadgets.description: Melodie's notes get 25% increased movement speed and 60% wider orbit for 5 seconds.

gadgets.name: Interlude
gadgets.description: Melodie gains 15% Shield from each note orbiting her.

starpowers.name: Fast Beats
starpowers.description: Melodie gains 8% increased movement speed from each note orbiting her.

starpowers.name: Extended Mix
starpowers.description: Melodie's notes last for 25% longer before vanishing.

attack.name: Monster Notes
attack.description: Melodie shoots tiny monster notes from her mic, damaging enemies and spawning orbiting notes around her on hit.

super.name: Catchy Chorus
super.description: Melodie can dash forward multiple times to catch her enemies.
